content.question: Unlike earlier depictions of athletes from the culture in which it was produced, the seated boxer features wounds, scars, and a broken nose due to the periodâ€™s increased interest in

choices.label: trade and cultural exchange across Central and Southeast Asia
access to bronze and materials used to create sculptural detail
interest in emotional empathy and individual experience
political violence and warfare associated with imperial expansion

content.answer: interest in emotional empathy and individual experience

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
